Item.value: 2022-11-22 Principe 0: 1 target per WF + ccp DWG Link automatically add Principe 1: waiting for status of child &/or contextual link Principe 2: 4 eyes principe and claim Principe 3: email for each rejected + reset discipline & reviewer Principe 4: with specialist (new name) and claim Principe 5: pdf via dispatcher + waiting for user choice Principe 6: Env.Rev. of Eng.Art. as reference until status

Please perform Sign-Offs for Weld Check Task.
Click on Claim will assign to you the Welding Check task

WorkflowTemplate.name: Decision: some object waiting for Engineering Approval

Item.value:
Status Management of Assembly: - some children of this assembly are waiting for Engineering Approval, release them first
And/Or Status Management of Contextual Links: - Contextual link to reference is not released yet, release it first
For a better user experience, send to "CNO Validation Viewer" the data attached under "reference" of this workflow.
